Projects.title: Why Speech Up?
Projects.subtitle: 3 Core Features that Transform Your Speaking

benefit1.title: Real-time AI Feedback
benefit1.desc: AI analyzes pronunciation, speed, intonation, and emphasis in real-time to provide instant, actionable feedback.

benefit2.title: Tailored Training Courses
benefit2.desc: We provide customized scripts and curriculums for interviews, presentations, and daily conversations.

benefit3.title: Data-Driven Growth Reports
benefit3.desc: Visually track your improvement with before/after recordings and detailed performance analytics.

FeaturedProject.demoDescription: Discover the 4-step workflow of our AI-powered real-time speech coaching solution.
FeaturedProject.step1Description: Choose between Script Speech and Impromptu Speech. Each mode offers customized training tailored to your needs.
FeaturedProject.step1Feature1: Script Speech: Practice with prepared content
FeaturedProject.step1Feature2: Impromptu Speech: Present on the spot like real life
FeaturedProject.step2Description: Select scenarios for business, interviews, presentations and more. Adjust difficulty and duration to match your level.
FeaturedProject.step3Description: Our AI generates personalized scripts in real-time based on your selected settings.
FeaturedProject.step3Feature2: Natural scenarios suited to your situation
FeaturedProject.step4Description: Practice with the generated script and receive instant AI feedback on your performance.
FeaturedProject.step4Feature2: Detailed feedback on clarity, pace, filler words
FeaturedProject.ctaDescription: Grow into a confident speaker with Speech Up. Your first week is free.

Demo.title: Speech Up: Your Personal AI Speech Coach
Demo.whyDescription: Many people have vague fears about "speaking." "My mind goes blank during interviews." "My voice trembles when giving presentations." "I don't know what to say when talking to people."
Demo.whyConclusion: But speech classes are expensive and hard to schedule. Also, many people feel embarrassed practicing in front of others. Speech Up is an app where you can practice speaking anytime, anywhere, without worrying about others' eyes, with your AI coach.
Demo.feature1Description: It's not just recording. AI analyzes your voice and gives you "real-time" feedback.
Demo.feature1Point2: Speed & Tone: Tells you if you're speaking too fast or if your voice is too monotonous (sounding like a robot).
Demo.feature1Point3: Habit Analysis: Catches how often you use unnecessary fillers like "um...", "uh..."
Demo.feature2Description: Practicing alone against a wall is boring, right? Speech Up throws you into various situations.
Demo.feature2Conclusion:
AI as an interviewer: "What's your motivation for applying to our company?" (Prepare for pressure interviews)
AI as a date: "What are your hobbies?" (Small talk practice)
AI as an angry customer: "I want a refund!" (Improve handling skills)
You can build confidence by having conversations with AI just like real situations.
Demo.feature3Description: No need to wonder "Am I actually improving?"
Demo.feature3Point1: Before & After: Compare your voice from the first day's recording with your current voice.
Demo.feature3Point2: Data Report: Shows score changes and practice volume in graphs to give you a sense of achievement.
Demo.howToSubtitle: Open the app and follow along. Just 10 minutes a day is enough!
Demo.step1Description: 10 minutes a day, the most effective routine to train your speech muscles. Complete the 3 steps in order.
Demo.step1Sub1Desc: Just like warming up your body before exercise, loosen your tongue and lips first. Follow along with high-difficulty sentences like "Ganjang gongjang gongjangjang..." shown on screen to release tension in your speech organs.
Demo.step1Sub2Desc: Short texts on various topics are given randomly. Practice reading news reports, poetry recitation, speeches, and other diverse texts out loud to train accurate pronunciation, breathing, and rhythm.
Demo.step1Sub3Desc: The ultimate quick-thinking training! When a question like "What's your favorite season?" is suddenly thrown at you, speak your thoughts logically for 1 minute. This develops your ability to express unorganized thoughts in words.
Demo.step2Sub1Desc: Choose a situation like business or wedding speeches, and AI will write a script for you. Just reading it accurately improves your pronunciation skills.
Demo.step2Sub2Desc: When you need "quick thinking"! Respond logically for 1-2 minutes to questions AI suddenly throws at you ("What's your life movie?").
Demo.step3Description: A killer feature tailored to your personal presentation situation! Use this when you need a script perfectly suited to your unique situation.
Demo.step3Sub1Example1: "My best friend's wedding is next week, and I want to give a touching yet fun speech."
Demo.step3Sub1Example2: "I need a 3-minute presentation script to highlight my achievements in a company promotion review."
Demo.step3Sub1Example3: "I became the alumni association president, but I can't think of a great inauguration speech."
Demo.step3Sub2Desc: In the 'Real Practice' tab, press **[Custom Script Generation]** and describe the situation in detail. AI will instantly write a one-of-a-kind script perfectly suited to that situation. You can practice with that script right away.
Demo.step4Description: The most essential and fun feature! If you have trouble with one-on-one conversations, try having real-time conversations with virtual characters. It will help a lot with conversations.
Demo.step4UsageDesc: In the 'Real Practice' tab, choose a situation like [Interview], [Date], [Salary Negotiation]. AI will start the conversation. Answer comfortably as if talking to a real person. AI will ask follow-up questions based on your answers.
Demo.step5Sub1Desc: Listen again to the parts AI pointed out (where pronunciation was unclear or too fast).
Demo.step5Sub2Desc: "Ah, I should have said it this way!" Learn more sophisticated expressions that AI suggests.
Demo.step5Sub3Desc: You can practice again with the more sophisticated expressions AI suggests. Listen directly through recordings and videos to check your weak points yourself.
Demo.ctaText: "The most reliable way to be reborn as 'a person without fear of speaking' with an AI coach in your hands, without expensive tuition fees - Speech Up!"

Footer.tagline: Expanding Human Potential through Code. Building AI-powered solutions that make a difference.
